ragas.name: Megh Malhar
ragas.description: A majestic monsoon raga, Megh Malhar evokes the grandeur of rain clouds and the refreshing atmosphere of monsoon season. Its deep, resonant character creates a sense of awe and natural beauty, perfect for dawn's awakening.
ragas.aroha: S R G M P D N S'
ragas.avroha: S' N D P M G R S
ragas.pakad: S R G M P D N S', G M P D N S'
